features: M Select™ DRY BARRIER impermeable membrane seals out water and lets moisture escape
Waterproof nubuck leather and mesh upper
Metal hook and lacing eyelets for secure fit
TPU molded heel counter for security
Kinetic Fit™ BASE removable contoured insole for flexible support
Merrell Air Cushion in the heel absorbs shock and adds stability
EVA foam midsole for stability and comfort
Lightweight FlexPlate™ technology provides torsional rigidity
